data.title: Samuel West Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Samuel West with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Was President of the Experimental Theatre Club at the University of Oxford

Is Chair of the National Campaign for the Arts

Directed the Olivier-nominated opera Cosi Fan Tutte in 2004, and the Olivier-nominated play Dealer's Choice in 2008

Participated in the 2006 and 2007 Choir of London tour to Jerusalem and the West Bank, respectively

Became patron of the Sheffield Philharmonic Chorus in 2008

Nominated for an Olivier Award for Best Actor for ENRON in 2010 Is a patron for 3 charities; Scene and Heard, Eastside Educational Trust and Mousetrap Theater Projects
